                  info.jonclark.util.BufferedZipInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class BufferedZipInputStream
extends ZipInputStream

A class to conveniently read text from ZIP files

Constructor Detail

BufferedZipInputStream

public BufferedZipInputStream(InputStream stream)
Construct a new BufferedZipInputStream from an InputStream object

Parameters:
stream - The stream from which input will be read
Method Detail

nextEntry

public boolean nextEntry()
                  throws IOException
Move to the next entry in this ZIP file, if there is one. Determines: Have we reached the end of the zip file?

Returns:
True if this BufferedZipInputStream has another entry
Throws:
IOException

readLine

public String readLine()
                throws IOException
Read a line from the current ZIP entry. nextEntry() must be called before this method.

Returns:
The next line. null if this is the end of the ZIP entry.
Throws:
IOException
